text.text: Christian Whitehead 2D Game Engine Fourth 2013 Files Joypad

text.name: sys_description
text.text: The mobile version of Sonic 1 and 2 was developed in 2013 via Christian Whitehead's Retro Engine. Sega had asked him to use this engine to offer remastered versions on iOS and Android. Later, he will also be part of the Sonic Mania team... The mobile versions are widely considered to be the best way to play these titles, as they offer new content like Tails and Knuckles playable in both titles and a camera which makes it easier for players to see what awaits them. Here is the port of these versions...
